post.body: Cool! Um, but who is Wayne? Unrelated: why is it tweetup & not tweetdown?
wow! 13? Is he a rescue?
Bout time, right? Prices are good, entr√©es okay, nothing too exciting that anyone should drive out of way for.
Nah woulda happened by now. @jtbritto @kaushalmodi Instead of Hooters owl, a Peckers woodpecker. Etc etc.
QT events are teh Devil.
Long time ago I heard someone mention opening such a restaurant called, wait for it..."Peckers".
I've seriously been considering switching from Golds to PF. Need to go check it out.
no but R5 is coming soon for 360. Me no havey PS2. For scary on 360 I think highest default is Dead Space.
oh wow. that's a good one. what system are you playing on? ps2?
yes you should be up to 8000 by now. stop it with the slacking. you are not pulling your weight around here.
Going to give him a Kindle for Xmas?
that's what she said.
Biggest crime in my book is holding relevant content material "after the jump" Ad rev got ya by the balls? Info up front plz.
what's on the agenda?
My cuz called me a twitter whore today. Welcome to my world lol
ya, I gotcha. :) I streamed via Netflix. And as @adam10 said it's on hulu too. Great writing & char + many cameos.
et al. tweeps: Have you seen 30Rock? I watched Season 1 in a week. Terribly good. Season 2 is even better.
you are the BEST. FEDEx OVERNIGHT! Do they make head mounts? ;)
I thought she looked pretty good on 30Rock. She really damaged herself in the 80s, right? Cocaine?
Let's have dinner? Not only do I like to hear myself speak, I also like to look at myself in the mirror. You can just hold it.
np.
used to be a big headache, only minor now. Keeping finder open on net'd HDD stops drive spindown. Wireless trnsfer spd is ache now
that said: it works. Slowly & smewhat begrudgingly at times (relogin to AirDisk fixes) but it does work. Also nice for wirefree HDD
Yep. Airport Extreme + WD 500GB MyBook / TimeMachine = Networked Media + Backup device
Whoa. That's very sad. I do hope they apprehend him soon. Horrible to lose someone so violently like that.
Hasn't there been enough crime without you hitting REI, too? ;-P
Wow. I was wondering what all those sirens on Wendover were for! Yikes. Hope the person's alright.
yeah, thats 4 Ive seen IRL! Only 1 in urban area tho. Like this, but was cold & is why I think fur looked bigger http://is.gd/bAEW
I wouldn't say they were HUGE. I'd say they were DISGUSTING
I th
where at? Los Angeles? ;)
Reminds me, nanna used to say: A good handjob is hard to find so, when you do, hold on to it. No- they should- wait STARTOVER
All done. Had last one yesterday, makeup assn done today. All went well save for macroecon which swirlied my grey matter. ouch.
O, that is strange. I think I rem that now. I selected your twt to reply to by mistake, but just wrote @JohnNewsom in there.
hurrr....how does that work? damn this confounded Adobe Air contraption.
Indeed, gold filter. Research shows cloth filters are best way drip/steep. Gold has particulate, paper steals oil, tasty oil.
No long relationship I've had ever started in a bar. Maybe I'm doing it wrong? Plus, I would be tempted to take you home, uSexyBeast
only applicable to those who actually HAVE a love life #lovelifenotincluded
Are you her Twitter-proxy? Tell her to get with it! ;)
I appreciate how @hodgman refuses to conform to the 140 char twitter story standard. That man is truly groundbreaking, bcuz ya know MOLES.
Was told Beck is a Scientologist. I will never listen to "Volcano" the same way again.
I was early for my german final. 24 hours early. That's right. I make Boy Scouts look like FEMA.
Trying out new Asian fusion joint, Xia, a block from my apartment.
Just earned myself a self-imposed 2 day twitter ban for that last tweet. Totally worth it.
Lou Ferigno & Adam West on King of the Hill!? Must- continue- hating- this show- aww damn it, I can't fight it. Gimme a hug fat funny man!
Colin Powell wants to review and possibly change "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" policy?!? I am amazed. Seen on @CNN
"Celebrate your laziness": http://is.gd/beWq
Sunglasses? While doing tricep pushdowns? Not just any sunglasses, but BIG GOLD framed STATE TROOPER shades. I bow to your superior ego, sir
iPOS symptom #4: I CANTFINDMYMP3PLAYER OMG WHERE IS IT?!?!!!11111
XBox 360 "Lips" ad features lip syncage, hipsters, and "Young Folk". Nice try, Gates. Cheap shot and lame. NOW GIVE IT TO ME I NEEDS IT
Anyone know what the heck those small 3 wheeler vehicles are next to Higgins Lock & Key on Battleground? At Triad Auto World, I think?
Driving back from work downtown and a beautiful grey fox ran across the street in front of me. Train was crossing Elm, prolly scared it out
Chris Walken in Puss N' Boots!!! Best Walken movie evar. He sings! Well, kind of.
Some scientists fear the shortage will affect squirrel populations: http://is.gd/bluJ What the HELL is wrong with people? #SQUIRRELSAREEVIL
Vulcan Nerf not Nerf enough for ya? http://tinyurl.com/796kou http://tinyurl.com/8las7m
Woke from terrible nightmare. Robert DeNiro was starring in Subway commercials.
"Are you familiar with Starbucks drinks?" "Is Jon Stewart familiar with CNN?" Over her head. Service industry humor is difficult sometimes.
Just for clarification on the last tweet, a double copula isn't a porn reference, although....I guess it could be. http://tinyurl.com/68375a
Reading about "double copula" on WIkipedia at 4AM. This is what I do now that the semester over.
1931 issue of Austrian Electrocution Illustrated: http://tinyurl.com/5wzrmn
French press coffee this morning because coffee was meant to have a crema. That, and disposing of coffee filters makes me think of diapers.
No MacWorld Expo? EVAR? How will I fill the void in my life only white plastic technology can fill? Steve, baby? Can't we talk about this?
New alternative to unleaded coffee, diesel coffee: http://tinyurl.com/55s8nq
Semester not quite over. One makeup assignment and I am done. Pass me that eyeliner? #TOOFUNNY *snortle*
